main event: An object was observed flying in formation with an airliner from the ground in Wertherley, Pennsylvania on March 22, 1950 at 8:30 PM EST.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes.
The object was reported to be flying in formation with an airliner.
The report suggests the object was likely a reflection from the airliner.
No report was received from the airliner.
The location is given as Wertherley, Pennsylvania.
sighted object: unidentified object flying in formation with an airliner
